function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease propagation in urban areas","Impact":"Risk of widespread disease transmission, economic disruption, and strain on healthcare resources","Mitigation":"Implementing strict public health measures, promoting vaccination, and increasing healthcare capacity","Technologies":"Health monitoring systems, contact tracing apps, and rapid testing kits","People":"Urban population, healthcare workers, and essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and urban planners"}]}
